DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study is to determine the extend to which OMT is effective on a sample of subjects affected by migraine evaluated using the headache impact test (HIT-6) questionnaire.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Effectiveness of Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment in Chronic Migraine
DOC.criteria: aged between 18 and 60 years old chronic migraine secondary forms of headache, chronic illness, psychiatric illness, postmenopausal women
